update PD_CORRECTIVE_ACTION_DETAIL
MASTER_ID = #{masterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FORM_RESPONSE_DETAIL_ID = #{formResponseDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ERROR_CAUSE = #{errorCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_CAUSE = #{otherCause,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CORRECTIVE_ACTION = #{correctiveAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OTHER_CORRECTIVE_ACTION = #{otherCorrectiveAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.insert:
SELECT s_pd_corrective_action_detail.NextVal FROM DUAL
insert into pd_corrective_action_detail( id, master_id, form_response_detail_id, version, created_dtm, created_by, last_modified_dtm, last_modified_by, deleted ) select s_pd_corrective_action_detail.NextVal, A.* from ( (select #{detail.masterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.formResponseDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.createdDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail.createdBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.lastModifiedDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{detail.lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail.deleted,jdbcType=BIT} from DUAL) ) A
